    • addAssignment

      public void addAssignment​(java.lang.Long _id, java.lang.String _name, java.lang.Long _student, java.lang.Long _problem, float _grade) throws ValidatorException
      The method adds an assignment with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the student which is to be added
      _name - Name of the assignment
      _student - the student which the assignment is assigned to
      _problem - the problem corresponding to this assignment
      _grade - the grade received for the assignment
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the given attributes are invalid

    • getAllAssignments

      public java.util.Set<Assignment> getAllAssignments()
      The method collects all the assignments in a Set.
      Returns:
      a Set containing all assignments in the repository

    • filterAssignmentsByName

      public java.util.Set<Assignment> filterAssignmentsByName​(java.lang.String _substring)
      The method returns all assignments whose name contain the given string.
      Parameters:
      _substring - the string that it is looked for in the names
      Returns:
      a Set of assignments whose names contain the string _substring

    • filterAssignmentsByStudent

      public java.util.Set<Assignment> filterAssignmentsByStudent​(java.lang.Long _student)
      The method returns all assignments for a given Student
      Parameters:
      _student - the student for which the search is made
      Returns:
      a Set of assignments that belong to the given student

    • removeAssignment

      public void removeAssignment​(java.lang.Long _id) throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
      The method deletes the assignment with the given id.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the assignment that will be deleted
      Throws:
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the given id does not correspond to any assignment

    • updateAssignment

      public void updateAssignment​(java.lang.Long _id, java.lang.String _newName, java.lang.Long _newStudent, java.lang.Long _newProblem, float _newGrade) throws java.lang.Exception
      The method updates an assignment with the given id.
      Parameters:
      _id - the id of the assignment what will be updated
      _newName - the new name of the assignment
      _newStudent - the new student for the assignment
      _newProblem - the new problem for the assignment
      _newGrade - the new grade for the assignment
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if either the student with the given id does not exist or the new attributes are not valid
